description: Graphs ZFS ARC and ARC L2 Hit %, Hits, Misses, Size, and Zpool

targets.expr: avg without (type, device, parent) (zfs_pool_fragmentation_percent{instance="$instance", pool="$pool", type="raidz"})

max by (instance, pool) (zfs_pool_size_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type="root"}) -
sum by (instance, pool) (zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool"})

rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total[$interval]) 
* on (instance, device) group_left(pool, parent)
count without() (
  max by (instance, pool, parent, device) (
    label_replace(zfs_pool_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", type="disk"}, "device", "$1", "path", "/dev/(.+)")
  )
)

title: ZFS
